channel.title: Homes on Theory of Change
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Theory of Change

item.description: About the Author AndersonDraper Consulting Inc. is an Edmonton-based company, which focuses on program and policy evaluation, with a specific expertise in community and outcome-based evaluations. The firm is a partnership between Michelle Anderson-Draper, Credentialed Evaluator, who has been involved in evaluation for the past 15 years and Sean Draper, a certified software developer (MCSD.NET) Sean brings over 20 years experience as a Data Scientist with a focus on information management, data analysis, visual data modeling and application development.

item.title: Teaching & Academic Coursework
item.description: I served as a sessional instructor for the Department of Health Sciences, Human Kinetics at the University of Ottawa, teaching the following courses: Graduate Level Quantitative Dat Analysis in Sport, Physical Activity and Health Quantitative Research Methods in Sport, Physical Activity and Health Undergraduate level Measurement and Data Analysis in Human Kinetics Masters Level Data Analysis and Statistics courses taken: APA5101: Introduction to Research APA5191: Methods and Interpretation in Quantitative Research I EDU6191: Methods and Interpretation of Quantitative Research II EDU7190: Qualitative Research: Perspectives and Approach EDU7390: Analysis and Interpretation of Multivariate Data in Education EDU7293: Non-Parametric Methods in Education Doctorate Level Data Analysis and Statistics courses taken:
